generated_backstory: Born as an orphan on the bustling seaport town of Oceanspire, Orion Maris was taken in by a notorious pirate crew. His natural knack for navigation and quick wit earned him a place among the crew, eventually rising to the rank of captain. Known for his green eyes, the 'Luck of the Maris', he led his crew through treacherous seas, amassing a formidable treasure hoard. However, a fateful encounter with a rival pirate king ended with Maris losing his left eye, earning him the nickname 'One-Eyed Maris'. Now, he seeks the legendary Eye of the Storm, a gem believed to grant the power of perfect sight, to restore his vision and reclaim his title as the most feared pirate in the Seven Seas.
